item.title: "A causal workflow in R with coupon marketing data"
item.description:
This post accompanies the talk presented at Fifth Elephant Winter 2025. The slides are available here

Introduction

This document demonstrates a complete causal inference workflow using real marketing data from the AmExpert 2019 Kaggle competition. The dataset contains transaction records, coupon assignments, and customer demographics from a retail store that â€¦
